sentence: We  asked  the  GMO  why  the  proportion  of  women  and  children  they  have  recorded  as  killed  is  so  much  higher  than  in  the  health  ministry's  data,  but  they  did  not  provide  a  direct  response  to  the  discrepancy.

article_title: Why has the UN revised its Gaza death toll for women and children?
sentence: Asked  by  BBC  Verify  why  it  made  the  change,  the  UN  said  it  used  the  GMO  data  for  women  and  children  killed  because  the  health  ministry  had  not  been  publishing  these  figures.
